00015 #include "nodebrowser.h"
00016 #include "measure.h"
00017 #include <qlineedit.h>
00018 #include <qcursor.h>
00019 #include <qtimer.h>
00020 #include <q3textbrowser.h>
00021 #include <kapplication.h>
00022 
00023 #include "ui_nodebrowserform.h"
00024 
00025 XNodeBrowser::XNodeBrowser
00026 (const shared_ptr<XNode> &root, FrmNodeBrowser *form)
00027 : XQConnector(root, form),
00028 m_root(root),
00029 m_pForm(form),
00030 m_desc(createOrphan<XStringNode>("Desc", true)),
00031 m_conDesc(xqcon_create<XQTextBrowserConnector>(m_desc, form->m_txtDesc))
00032 {
00033     m_pTimer = new QTimer(this);
00034     connect(m_pTimer, SIGNAL (timeout() ), this, SLOT(process()));
00035     m_pTimer->start(500);
00036     form->m_txtDesc->setTextFormat(Qt::RichText);
00037 }
00038 
00039 XNodeBrowser::~XNodeBrowser()
00040 {
00041     m_pTimer->stop();
00042 }
00043 shared_ptr<XNode>
00044 XNodeBrowser::connectedNode(QWidget *widget) {
00045     if(!widget || (widget == m_pForm->m_txtDesc) ||
00046         (widget == m_pForm->m_edValue) || (widget == m_pForm)) {
00047         return shared_ptr<XNode>();
00048     }
00049     return XQConnector::connectedNode(widget);
00050 }
00051 
00052 void
00053 XNodeBrowser::process() {
00054     QWidget *widget;
00055     shared_ptr<XNode> node;
00056     //  widget = KApplication::kApplication()->focusWidget();
00057     //      node = connectedNode(widget);
00058     if(!node) {
00059         widget = KApplication::widgetAt(QCursor::pos());
00060         node = connectedNode(widget);
00061         if(!node && widget) {
00062             widget = widget->parentWidget();
00063             node = connectedNode(widget);
00064             if(!node && widget) {
00065                 widget = widget->parentWidget();
00066                 node = connectedNode(widget);
00067             }
00068         }
00069     }
00070 
00071     if(!node)
00072         node = m_lastPointed;
00073     if((node != m_lastPointed) && node) {
00074         shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> valuenode(dynamic_pointer_cast<XValueNodeBase>(node));
00075         shared_ptr<XListNodeBase> listnode(dynamic_pointer_cast<XListNodeBase>(node));
00076 
00077         m_conValue.reset();
00078         if(valuenode)
00079             m_conValue = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(valuenode, m_pForm->m_edValue);
00080         QString str;
00081         str += "<font color=#005500>Label:</font> ";
00082         str += node->getLabel().c_str();
00083         //      str += "\nName: ";
00084         //      str += node->getName();
00085         str += "<br>";
00086         if(!node->isUIEnabled()) str+= "UI/scripting disabled.<br>";
00087         if(node->isRunTime()) str+= "For run-time only.<br>";
00088         str += "<font color=#005500>Type:</font> ";
00089         str += node->getTypename().c_str();
00090         str += "<br>";
00091         XString rbpath;
00092         shared_ptr<XNode> cnode = node;
00093         while(cnode) {
00094             if((rbpath.length() > 64) ||
00095                 (cnode == m_root.lock())) {
00096                 str += "<font color=#550000>Ruby object:</font><br> Measurement";
00097                 str += rbpath.c_str();
00098                 str += "<br><font color=#550000>Supported Ruby methods:</font>"
00099                     " name() touch() child(<font color=#000088><i>name/idx</i></font>)"
00100                     " [](<font color=#000088><i>name/idx</i></font>) count() each() to_ary()";
00101                 if(valuenode)
00102                     str += " set(<font color=#000088><i>x</i></font>)"
00103                         " value=<font color=#000088><i>x</i></font> load(<font color=#000088><i>x</i></font>)"
00104                         " &lt;&lt;<font color=#000088><i>x</i></font> get() value() to_str()";
00105                 if(listnode)
00106                     str += " create(<font color=#000088><i>type</i></font>, <font color=#000088><i>name</i></font>)"
00107                         " release()";
00108                 str += "<br>";
00109                 break;
00110             }
00111             rbpath = formatString("[\"%s\"]%s", cnode->getName().c_str(), rbpath.c_str());
00112             cnode = cnode->getParent();
00113         }
00114         if(!cnode) {
00115             //          str += rbpath;
00116             str += "Inaccessible from the root.<br>";       
00117         }
00118         atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> list(node->children());
00119         if(list) { 
00120             str += formatString("<font color=#005500>%u Child(ren):</font> <br>", (unsigned int)list->size()).c_str();
00121             for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = list->begin(); it != list->end(); it++) {
00122                 str += " ";
00123                 str += (*it)->getName().c_str();
00124             }
00125             str += "<br>";
00126         }
00127         m_desc->str(str);
00128     }
00129     m_lastPointed = node;
00130 }
